attributes.action: Stop councils making disabled pay for a parking permit for tax exempt vehicles.
attributes.background: Since the abolition of the tax disk displayed on vehicles, some councils have been making the disabled obtain a permit to park. This generally incurs an annual fee. Where living near the boundaries of different councils several permits may be required.

rejection.details:
The issue you raise is the responsibility of local councils.

You could raise the matter with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor
